channel.title: Need runserver help plz!
channel.description:
can some1 help me with runserver everytime i compile it its succesfull but when i runserver it sais
Error occurred during initialization of VM java/lang/NoClassDefFoundError: java/lang/Object Press any key to continue . . .
and i have java downloaded jdk 6u2 the code im useing for the runserver is
@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\jdk-1_5_0_06-windows-i586-p.exe java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause
if some1 can help me that would be great

item.title: Need runserver help plz!
item.dc:creator: @goneby1233 goneby1233
item.description:
@goneby1233 wrote:

can some1 help me with runserver everytime i compile it its succesfull but when i runserver it sais

Error occurred during initialization of VM
java/lang/NoClassDefFoundError: java/lang/Object
Press any key to continue . . .

and i have java downloaded jdk 6u2 the code im useing for the runserver is

@echo off
title Runserver
set java="C:\jdk-1_5_0_06-windows-i586-p.exe
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

if some1 can help me that would be great
